name: Goodorbad
0:
”Alexa open good or bad”
”Are biscuits bad?”
”Is apple good?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: good or bad
des:
This skill is intended to tell you if something is good or bad from a predefined list. 
My child was having a healthy discussion to me if a particular vegetable is good for him, staring at his plate with doubts. I responded, why don't we ask Alexa. Of course Alexa responded with the standard response "I don't know that one". 

Are apples good or bad? Ever wondered if something is good or bad for you? This app will help you answer some of those questions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
